00028 MotorCommand::MotorCommand( double lC, double aC): linearConst(lC), angConst(aC) {
00029 }
00030 
00031 void MotorCommand::doProcess() {
00032         int rmp1= linearConst * this->linearVelocity + angConst*this->angularVelocity;
00033         int rmp2= linearConst * this->linearVelocity - angConst*this->angularVelocity;
00034         if(!(MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel1, rmp1)&&MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel2, rmp2)))
00035                 this->success = false;
00036         MotorController::instance()->doProcess();
00037         this->success =  true;
00038 
00039 }

00042 }

00047 
00048 void DualMotorCommand::doProcess() {
00049         WiiController * controller = WiiController::getReference();
00050         uint16_t lxaxis, lyaxis;
00051         uint16_t rxaxis, ryaxis;
00052         controller->getLeftStick( lxaxis, lyaxis );
00053         controller->getRightStick( rxaxis, ryaxis );
00054 
00055         double lspeed = ((lyaxis-32)/32.0)*1000; //need to divide by 32 because the l stick gives us 6 bits precision
00056         double rspeed = ((ryaxis-16)/16.0)*1000; //need to divide by 16 because the r stick gives us 5 bits precision
00057 
00058 #ifdef DEBUG
00059         cout << "lyaxis:" << lyaxis << "Lspeed " << (int)lspeed << endl;
00060         cout << "ryaxis:" << ryaxis << "Rspeed " << (int)rspeed << endl;
00061 #endif
00062 
00063                 MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel1, (int)lspeed);
00064                 MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel2, (int)rspeed);
00065                 MotorController::instance()->doProcess();
00066 
00067 }
